name: Erik Wilhelm Dahlgren
obverse: Bust of Erik Wilhelm Dahlgren facing left.
reverse_inscriptions: ERICO GUILELMO DAHLGREN REG·BIBLIOTHECAE HOLMIENSIS PRAEFECTO D·XXX·M·IUNII A·MCMXVI COLLEGAE AMICI
description: Erik Wilhelm Dahlgren was a librarian and geographer.
Approximately 150 examples were made in silver and bronze.
